pages.text: The Leviathan is a strong boss that is located in the sunken citadel in the ocean.$(br2)The Leviathan is a difficult water based boss with crazy AOE attacks and grab attacks! Not recommended until end game.
The Leviathan is a water based boss with tough attacks to dodge.

pages.title: Eye of Abyss
pages.text: You use this eye the same way you would use an eye of ender to find the sunken citadel.$(br2)When you find this citadel you will need to have the abyssal sacrifice to summon the boss.
The abyssal sacrifice is created using valuable resources so only create it when you are ready. Coral chunks are found in the citadel when killing coral golems.
The Coralssus can only survive in water and will drop coral chunks used to craft the abyssal sacrifice.
The coral golem is also found in the citadel and will drop crysal coral which is also used to craft the abyssal sacrifice.
You will need to place the abyssal sacrifice inside of the altar of abyss in order to summon The Leviathan.

The tidal claws are a very cool weapon to have. It acts as a grappling hook as well as a weapon that sucks the life out of every mob.$(br2)It shoots out a tentacle that harms every mob in the area. You can also pull mobs towards you with the grappling hook.
The Leviathan will drop the abyssal egg which you can hatch to get a baby leviathan. The baby leviathan is VERY strong and you can pick it up in a bucket to travel.

pages.title: Baby Leviathan
pages.text: The baby leviathan is VERY strong and swims very fast.
